mapper.insert: insert into quan_account_future_secret (id, account_source_id, access_key, secret_key) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accountSourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, account_source_id, access_key, secret_key from quan_account_future_secret
select id, account_source_id, access_key, secret_key FROM quan_account_future_secret where account_source_id=#{id}
